text: @seanhannity Liar liar pants on fire........ coronavirus outbreak is caused by Trump and his inept brain and ego.  This is on Trump. And maybe you too for continually spreading lies.  #TrumpIsAnIdiot #TRumpCoronavirusCoverup #hannityLies
